description: If you're a huge Philadelphia fan, this is the app for you! Philadelphia Baseball Fans provides you with access to the latest news, videos, stats, standings and scores. You'll always know what's happening with the team!  Plus you’ll find detailed team, roster and schedule information, so you’ll always be the most knowledgeable fan in the room.   You can also discuss the latest news and highlights with other Philadelphia fans using the built in chat feature. Make sure your voice is heard!   There is no better or more comprehensive tool to stay up to date with Philadelphia. If you are a true fan, you owe it to yourself to download Philadelphia Baseball Fans today!   ** Arctic Gerbil Creations, Brighthouse Labs, and the Philadelphia Baseball Fans application are in no way associated with MLB or the Philadelphia Phillies baseball team. All trademarks are owned by their respective owners.
